nodes.text: Tyrus was a Human male who served as a major in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire, commanding the Fifth Infantry's Second Battalion. Stationed on Balmorra during the Cold War with the Galactic Republic, Tyrus oversaw his unit's combat with the Balmorran resistance; he dispatched Besh Company to plant viruses in the mainframe of the Okara Droid Factory, and was forced to recruit outside help after the company was nearly wiped out.
